text: Calibrachoa is a genus of the Solanaceae family. Plants of this genus can be used as potted plants. The plants are a lot like Petunias. Petunias and Calibrachoa together make up the clade Petunieae.Richard G. Olmstead und Lynn Bohs: A Summary of Molecular Systematic Research in Solanaceae: 1982-2006. In: D.M. Spooner et al. (ed.): Solanaceae VI: Genomics Meets Biodiversity, ISHS Acta Horticulturae 745, June 2007 == References == == Other websites == * Mishiba et al. 2000 Annals of Botany 85: 665â€“673, 2000 *Creative commons licence Category:Solanaceae
title: Calibrachoa
